TopicTitle: Cant get out of hatches, ksp 2.

Articles.Content:
I cant get out of crew hatches, or any hatch at all.

I"ve tested every single hatch/cabin, re-installed game, verified integrity of game files, used literally only one single part, the hatch to see, it didn't work, hatches aren't obstructed, any idea what bug this is? EVA worked fine on first day, but ever since 2nd day, EVA doesn't work at all.

CPU: IntelR XeonR, 4 logical processors, 4 physical processors

Windows 7 Professional 64 Bit

Video Card: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti

One Monitor, One logical video card

RAM: 32GB

KSP2

Mods: SpaceWarp, LazyOrbit and ManeuverNodeController

Im getting a new PC soon, i'll update this and tell yall if my problem is fixed on there.

It was because of persistent debris being set to 0.

Edited March 1, 2023 by EGGYKSP2
bug was fixed

Have you set max persistent debris to 0? 

When I did that I couldn't eva anymore.
